p: SA collected and analyzed the data for the SELDI-MS reproducibility study and EAE protein profile study and contributed to the interpretation of the results and the writing; LB performed the fluorescence studies of MBP contamination, SL performed the Western blot analysis of MBP contamination in fresh and frozen tissue, EF and JM contributed to the study design and the interpretation of the results, RBG contributed to the study design, interpretation of the results and the writing. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
